mapper.select: SELECT hu.user_id userId, hui.truename trueName, hui.idcard idCard, FROM_UNIXTIME( hu.reg_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) regDate FROM ht_bank_open_account hbo JOIN ht_user hu ON hbo.user_id = hu.user_id JOIN ht_user_info hui ON hbo.user_id = hui.user_id WHERE hbo.create_time BETWEEN from_unixtime( #{startDate} ) AND from_unixtime( #{endDate} ) AND hu.bank_open_account = 1 AND hu.user_type = 0 UNION SELECT hu.user_id userId, "" trueName, hbo.busi_code idCard, FROM_UNIXTIME( hu.reg_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) regDate FROM ht_corp_open_account_record hbo JOIN ht_user hu ON hbo.user_id = hu.user_id WHERE hbo.create_time BETWEEN from_unixtime( #{startDate} ) AND from_unixtime( #{endDate} ) AND hu.bank_open_account = 1 AND hu.user_type = 1

select hu.user_id userId, CASE WHEN hu.user_type = 0 THEN hui.truename WHEN hu.user_type = 1 THEN '' ELSE '' END trueName, CASE WHEN hu.user_type = 0 THEN hui.idcard WHEN hu.user_type = 1 THEN hcoar.busi_code ELSE '' END idCard, FROM_UNIXTIME(hu.reg_time,'%Y-%m-%d') regDate from ht_user hu left join ht_user_info hui on hu.user_id = hui.user_id left join ht_corp_open_account_record hcoar on hu.user_id = hcoar.user_id where hu.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
